web_snippets: Scott Hoots is an outstanding person to work with. He takes the time to set a clear and relevant vision and communicate expectations to everyone in the company.
Scott Hoots. Franchise Coach. Scott is a 30-year veteran of the franchise industry, both on the franchisor and franchisee side.
